TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Ray_Allen, title = Ray_Allen, year = 2024, month = November, day = 18, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ray_Allen} }

S.FORM: Ray Allen nalecuhan i 7 bulad 20 demiad, 1975 a mihca, Ray Allen, u miunduay ciniza. Ray Allen unu syubay kanas mali miunduay nu Amilika NBA nisakaput, u misimaw zikuzay mimaliay, u mikilac zikuzay mimaliay. Ray Allen nalecuhan i Merced, California, nanu syubay kanas mali miunduay nu Amilika NBA nisakaput, pahanhanan tu kawaw ayza. Ray Allen i 1996 a mihcan NBA sapapili' mimaliay a kawaw, saka cacay ku uwac atu silsil lima, namapili' tu nu Minnesota Timberwolves putiput. kakuniza namakayniay a nasulitan nasakamuan atu natinengan Lists of National Basketball Association players
